metadataAttributes.Title: Developing Applications with Google Cloud Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Design, Develop, and Deploy Apps on Google Cloud. Build secure, scalable, and intelligent cloud-native applications.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Debugging, Google Cloud Platform, Cloud Storage, Application development, Cloud Computing, Google Compute Engine, Google App Engine (GAE), Data Store, Application Programming Interfaces (API), Cloud Functions, Identity Management (IDM), Cloud Endpoints,
